alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 05 at 8:29PM CDT until September 09 at 11:26AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Texas... Nueces River near Tilden affecting McMullen County. For the Nueces River...including Tilden...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nueces River near Tilden. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, much of the flood plain below Cotulla to below Tilden is cut off, as sloughs and peripheral channels fill. Hunting cabins, oil field pump jacks and tank batteries flood well away from the channel. Livestock are cut off and can drown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday, the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning, crest near 15.4 feet early Thursday morning, then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Nueces River Tilden 14.0 7.6 Mon 7 pm 9.6 15.1 15.3 13.2 10.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
